Package spring.controller

Class IdeaController

  • java.lang.Object
    • spring.controller.AbstractController
      • spring.controller.IdeaController
  • @Controller
public class IdeaController
extends AbstractController
    Controller handles all requests for URLs beginning with "/idea". This controller is designed for the creation and manipulation of @{link spring.model.Idea} objects.
    Author:
    Shane Lockwood

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      IdeaController()

      Loads the idea view provided the @{link spring.model.Idea}'s id with a subset of Developments and Comments.

      Adds or modifies an IdeaVote.

      • newIdea

        @PostMapping("/idea/new/create")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.view.RedirectView newIdea​(@RequestParam(value="title",required=true)
                                                                 java.lang.String title,
                                                                 @RequestParam(value="description",required=true)
                                                                 java.lang.String description,
                                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Accepts parameters from the new idea form to create and save an Idea object.
        Parameters:
        title - The String containing the title provided by the client.
        description - The String containing the description provided by the client.
        session - The HttpSession passed between the client and server.
        request - The HttpServletRequest which stores the UserPrincipal.
        Returns:
        model

      • idea

        @GetMapping("/idea")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView idea​(@RequestParam(value="id",required=false)
                                                         java.lang.Integer id,
                                                         @RequestParam(value="ideaPageOfDevelopments",required=false)
                                                         java.lang.Integer ideaPageOfDevelopments,
                                                         @RequestParam(value="ideaPageOfComments",required=false)
                                                         java.lang.Integer ideaPageOfComments,
                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Loads the idea view provided the @{link spring.model.Idea}'s id with a subset of Developments and Comments.
        Parameters:
        id - The Integer of the associated Idea's id.
        ideaPageOfDevelopments - The Integer representing the desired subset of Developments to display.
        ideaPageOfComments - The Integer representing the desired subset of Comments to display.
        session - The HttpSession passed between the client and server.
        Returns:
        model

      • ideaVote

        @PostMapping("/idea/new/vote")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.view.RedirectView ideaVote​(@RequestParam(value="upVote",required=true)

                                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Adds or modifies an IdeaVote.
        Parameters:
        upVote - The String representation of a boolean.
        session - The HttpSession passed between the client and server.
        request - The HttpServletRequest which stores the UserPrincipal.
        Returns:
        model
